column2: "Me mpa do anadwe na mohwehwɛɛ nyia me kra dɔɔ no no: Mohwehwɛɛ no

column5: Wɔ abrɔn mu na gua do
column6: Mobɔhwehwɛ nyia me kra dɔ no no: Mohwehwɛɛ no

column2: "Aweɔmfo a wokyin kurow no ho no hun me: Hɔn na mibisaa hɔn dɛ
column3: Ana hom ehu nyia me kra dɔ no no?"
Nna muhun nyia me kra dɔ no no: Musuoo no mu dɛ minnkegyaa no ma ɔaakɔ
column4: Ekodu dɛ medze no bodu me na fie
column5: Na nyia onyinseen me no ne pia mu ana."

column3: hom nka ntam nkyerɛ me Hom mfa nwansan na ɔtweba a wɔwɔ hamu nka ntam

column2: "Woana nye oyi a ofi sar do reba dɛ wusiw fadum
column4: Na oguadzifo nduhuam ayɛ no ho huatsee yi?"

column3: Solomon n’apakan a; Mbarimba akatakyi eduosia na woetwa ho ehyia
column4: Israel mbarimba akatakyi no mu bi a."

column3: na wɔawea asayɛ ho: Nyimpa biara n’afona bɔ n’asen

column4: n’egua no ɔberdum a; Jerusalɛm mbabaa dze anwendze a ɔyɛ fɛw Edura no mu no."

column3: hom mpue mbɔhwɛ ɔhen Solomon a Ɔbɔ n’abɔtsir a ne na dze bɔɔ ne tsir wɔ n’ayehyia da
column4: Da a n’akoma nyaa enyigye no."
